basics.name: Shantanu Rahman
basics.label: Robotics & Computer Vision Engineer
basics.summary: Robotics & Computer Vision engineer with 3 years of professional experience on edge/IoT systems and robotics, 8+ years of coding in C/C++ and Python, and a strong competitive-programming background. Experienced in computer-vision pipelines, model optimisation (ONNX/TensorRT/DeepStream) and research-driven problem-solving.
